data.name: Troll
data.description:
Troll

Units:
+5% evasion
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+3Lv Ranged Weapons

Traits: Why so serious? Come and have a smoke with us! Fragile in early game, unpredictable in late game. Debilitates and confuses enemy. You won't win all games, but you will have fun in every single one.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Paralysis Aura
auras.description:
-20% unit move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Voodoo Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit damage
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Sharpshooter Aura
auras.description:
+20% building damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta [Q]
bonuses.description:
Kul'ghan replaces Uru'zin

Hero Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Tank
Can learn:
Regeneration (Self Spell)
300-600 HP over 10 seconds
Spear Spin (Passive Skill)
10% to retaliate 80-140 damage
Spiked Shield (Passive Skill)
30-60 dmg to melee attacker
Heavy Shield (Passive Skill)
16-28% to block an attack

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Orb of Shadows [W]
bonuses.description:
Increases Skullsplinter, Headhunter and Beastrider attack rate by 7% and gives them 10/20/30% chance to curse their targets for 30% miss chance.
(does not affect Special unit)
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Minor Anti Hero / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Merchant
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]

No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

towerUpgrades.name: Feral Roar
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage in 500 AoE
Affects: Beastrider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: +12% damage for 30 sec
Lv2: +24% damage for 32 sec
Lv3: +36% damage for 34 sec
Lv4: +48% damage for 36 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Troll Regeneration
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration
Affects: Skullsplinter, Headhunter, Witch Doctor and Wardbearer

Lv1: +4 HP/sec regeneration
Lv2: +8 HP/sec regeneration
Lv3: +12 HP/sec regeneration
Lv4: +16 HP/sec regeneration

towerUpgrades.name: Shredder Spears
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Headhunter, Spear Tower and Wardbearer
(also stuns for 0.6 sec)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10% chance for 15 damage
Lv2: 20% chance for 30 damage
Lv3: 30% chance for 45 damage
Lv4: 35% chance for 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Berserk
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: faster attack for armor penalty
Affects: Skullsplinter and Headhunter

Lv1: +15% attack rate, +10% damage taken
Lv2: +30% attack rate, +20% damage taken
Lv3: +45% attack rate, +30% damage taken
Lv4: +60% attack rate, +40% damage taken

spells.name: Berserk (Lv1)
spells.description: Causes this unit to attack 15% faster, but to take 10% more damage.

spells.name: Berserk (Lv1)
spells.description: Causes this unit to attack 15% faster, but to take 10% more damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Mighty Blow
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun on each attack
Affects: Beastrider
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 10% chance for 1.2 sec stun
Lv2: 20% chance for 1.4 sec stun
Lv3: 30% chance for 1.6 sec stun
Lv4: 35% chance for 1.8 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Resistant Hide
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack block and spell resistance
Affects: Beastrider and Batrider

Lv1: 6% to block, -15% spell damage
Lv2: 12% to block, -30% spell damage
Lv3: 18% to block, -45% spell damage
Lv4: 24% to block, -60% spell damage

towerUpgrades.name: Burning Oil
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Batrider and Demolisher
(deals 50% damage to buildings)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 3 seconds
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 3 seconds
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 3 seconds
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 3 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Voodoo Wardbearer
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Trance Ward (bonus attack rate)
+5%/+10%/+15%/+20% in 900 AoE
Lv2: has Stasis Ward (invisible stun trap)
30/60/90 sec duration, 2/3/4 sec stun
Lv3: has Voodoo Ward (reduces damage)
-15%/-20% damage in 900 AoE
Lv4: has Serpent Ward (attacks enemies)
summons 1 ward

spells.name: Serpent Wards - [Level 4]
spells.description: Summons serpentine ward.

towerUpgrades.name: Mind Control
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to take over units
Affects: Witch Doctor
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 4% chance on each attack
Lv2: 6% chance on each attack
Lv3: 8% chance on each attack
Lv4: 10% chance on each attack

t1spell.name: Stasis Lock [Z]
